title: Marc-André ter Stegen
summary: Marc-André ter Stegen (German pronunciation: [ˌmaʁk ʔanˈdʁeː teːɐ̯ ˈsteːɡn̩; - ʔãˈd-];[4] born 30 April 1992) is a German professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for La Liga club Barcelona and the Germany national team.[5][6][7] Known for his reflexes, passing, and ball-playing ability, he is considered one of the best goalkeepers in the world.[8][9]
